record.dc:title: She looketh to the ways of her household -
record.dc:description: She looketh to the ways of her household - she maketh fine linen and selleth it. The handicrafts of the ages are making better homes, and saving farms.
record.dc:subject: Handicraft
Women's roles
Homes
Gatlinburg, Tennessee
Pi Beta Phi Settlement School
Changing Mission of Pi Beta Phi Fraternity for Women in Gatlinburg, Tennessee, 1944-1964
